thread.title: An Unforgettable Summer Vacation at Four Seasons Resort Sharm El SheikhTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: An Unforgettable Summer Vacation at Four Seasons Resort Sharm El SheikhTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: An Unforgettable Summer Vacation at Four Seasons Resort Sharm El SheikhTravelandtourworld.com
text:
An Unforgettable Summer Vacation at Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh Published on : Saturday, July 18, 2015
Voted # 1 resort in the world by the readers of Condé Nast Traveler in 2011, Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh has unveiled its newest three night getaway package, just in time for a summer holiday by the shores of the Red Sea.
Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh is always keen to bring all the family closer together. The special Summer Promotion – Third Night Free offer features luxurious accommodations for families travelling with their young children.
Travellers receive a complimentary third night when booking two consecutive nights at the Resort. Now, guests can add a sparkle to their holiday and enjoy an extra day to explore the underwater world with a snorkeling excursion. Or, they can simply take a walk around the magnificent landscaped grounds while enjoying the tranquility of the Red Sea that soothes the mind and soul.
Offering the highest level of privacy and comfort to guests, families are pampered and can benefit from complimentary round–trip private transfers between the airport and the Resort in luxury vehicles, and indulge a complimentary lavish mouth–watering Mediterranean breakfast for two at Arabesque restaurant, with complimentary breakfast for children ages 12 and under dining with their parents.
All one needs to do is book their vacation, and Four Seasons Resort Sharm El Sheikh will guarantee top service and an exceptional experience. Spend quality time and make memories that last life time.
Source:-Four Seasons
